response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. Considering its significance and the fact that it would be a perfect fit for your needs, I am offering you the chance to own this item at a special introductory price. I propose that you purchase the product for $14,000. This price reflects my desire to see it go to someone who appreciates its true worth and will cherish it as much as I have. Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. I am looking forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 14000}
